description: A beautiful and responsive restaurant landing page built with ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, Vite, and a Custom API. This project showcases a modern and interactive web experience for users to explore delicious dishes, view ingredients, and manage their cart seamlessly.

title: Bottle Collection Shop
description: Bottle Collection is a simple, responsive e-commerce web application built with ReactJS, Vite, and a custom API. Users can browse a collection of bottles, view details, and add their desired bottles to a cart â€” simulating an online shopping experience. Mainly focused on functionality and responsive design, this project showcases the use of modern web technologies to create a user-friendly interface.

title: Onlie Phone Shop

title: Jatra Poribohon E-ticketing System
description: An interactive web-based e-ticketing platform for bus travel built. Allows users to book and manage bus ticket reservations via a clear and responsive interface. Features include Responive UI, Seat availability, and Booking management.

title: Alphabet Game
description: A game designed to help people to increase their typing speed and accuracy. The game presents a series of random letters, and the player must type them as quickly and accurately as possible. The game tracks the time taken to type each letter and calculates the player's typing words and increase score based on their performance.

title: Walk Abroad
description: A simple and responsive travel agency website built with HTML, CSS. This project showcases a modern and interactive web experience for users to explore various travel destinations, view details, and manage their bookings seamlessly.
